00096       other.row_limit = row_limit;
00097       other.max_versions = max_versions;

00118   class ScanSpecBuilder : boost::noncopyable {
00119   public:
00125     void set_row_limit(int32_t n) { m_scan_spec.row_limit = n; }
00126 
00132     void set_max_versions(uint32_t n) { m_scan_spec.max_versions = n; }
00133 
00139     void add_column(const String &str) {
00140       m_strings.push_back(str);
00141       m_scan_spec.columns.push_back(m_strings.back().c_str());
00142     }
00143 
00149     void add_row(const String &str) {
00150       RowInterval ri;
00151       m_strings.push_back(str);
00152       ri.start = ri.end = m_strings.back().c_str();
00153       ri.start_inclusive = ri.end_inclusive = true;
00154       m_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00155     }
00156 
00165     void add_row_interval(const String &start, bool start_inclusive,
00166                           const String &end, bool end_inclusive) {
00167       RowInterval ri;
00168       m_strings.push_back(start);
00169       ri.start = m_strings.back().c_str();
00170       ri.start_inclusive = start_inclusive;
00171       m_strings.push_back(end);
00172       ri.end = m_strings.back().c_str();
00173       ri.end_inclusive = end_inclusive;
00174       m_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);      
00175     }
00176 
00182     void add_cell(const String &row, const String &column) {
00183       CellInterval ci;
00184       m_strings.push_back(row);
00185       ci.start_row = ci.end_row = m_strings.back().c_str();
00186       m_strings.push_back(column);
00187       ci.start_column = ci.end_column = m_strings.back().c_str();
00188       ci.start_inclusive = ci.end_inclusive = true;
00189       m_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00190     }
00191 
00202     void add_cell_interval(const String &start_row, const String &start_column, bool start_inclusive,
00203                            const String &end_row, const String &end_column, bool end_inclusive) {
00204       CellInterval ci;
00205       m_strings.push_back(start_row);
00206       ci.start_row = m_strings.back().c_str();
00207       m_strings.push_back(start_column);
00208       ci.start_column = m_strings.back().c_str();
00209       ci.start_inclusive = start_inclusive;
00210       m_strings.push_back(end_row);
00211       ci.end_row = m_strings.back().c_str();
00212       m_strings.push_back(end_column);
00213       ci.end_column = m_strings.back().c_str();
00214       ci.end_inclusive = end_inclusive;
00215       m_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00216     }

00225     void set_time_interval(int64_t start, int64_t end) {
